website_summaries.verdict: The LG K10 for MetroPCS is a relatively affordable Android phone with a nice build, but it's held back by underpowered hardware.
pros: Expandable storage, removable battery, and NFC

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE works well, the downside is that it arrived in Chinese and i had to figure out how to change the settings for the language and it took a long while. it is supposed to come with a anthena however that did not come with the product. overall i liked it and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Buzgal

customer_reviews.title: Problems with U.S. Carriers
customer_reviews.text: This K10 is the international version from an Argentinian manufacture. Since it was made there, it uses the old 3g and not the new 4g signal meaning setting it up with a U.S. based carrier will not let you use the high speed band. If you don't use that much data or just use is as a second phone it is ok mid range phone. Specks arn't great but it will get the job done. Do not get this for your daily if data is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone is good in certin ways but not so good in others
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the phone and I can also use one sim card its not made for two but it works greate and thats all that matters and Im very happy with it so thankyou very much.
customer_reviews.author: country123

customer_reviews.title: a loss of time and money
customer_reviews.text: 2 phones 2 problems returned the first one after the day we got the product it didnt work properly and got a replacement from them, got the replacement not even 3 months same problem and pretty much gotta buy a whole new phone because its out of warranty owned the phone for less than 3 months.... i feel the customer deserves better
customer_reviews.author: bo

customer_reviews.title: No wifi calling!!!
customer_reviews.text: The model K430 phone is not a K10 phone. All K10 models have wifi calling feature. This phone does not.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Capetta

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road
customer_reviews.text: It's okay but for the money I spent I probably could have got a similar phone for less. I was just expecting more out of LG.
customer_reviews.author: YE

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The phone is malfunctioning. I haven't had it for 6 months. How can i return it?
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: No Warranty even though it says there is one.
customer_reviews.text: This phone died within 90 days. Can't return it and the company said I have to contact LG. Since it is an international phone LG will not service it in the United States. I've filed a claim with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: If it was all metal, it would have got 5 ⭐
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great phone, it's plenty fast and works great on my AT&T network. Combine with a good price and a nice camera I think it's worth a look.
customer_reviews.author: E Thomas Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Suppose to be unlocked to use any network. Will not work for Verizon
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: So far so good im loving my phone
customer_reviews.text: I have this phone a few days now and every day I discover something new about it. I didn't even know phones light up when you are using the front cam. This one does lots of space very fast good clear picture. I would buy one for my whole family... I love it i love it.....
customer_reviews.author: Keneisha

customer_reviews.title: Fine phone
customer_reviews.text: It does work with Android on Consumer Cellular, has a good glass display face, good battery life, and has so far has done everything I have needed.
customer_reviews.author: JON PATZER

customer_reviews.title: The only thing is that I had to pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is that I had to pay for another simm card but that is not the sellers fault.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Hollinhead

customer_reviews.title: great phone!
customer_reviews.text: it is kinda slow with certain apps but it even works fine with mine-craft PE and is capable of almost every function that you need in 2017
customer_reviews.author: a.adams

customer_reviews.title: The phone is excellent value price
customer_reviews.text: The phone is excellent value price. The camera takes wonderful high quality quality pictures. Do not be fooled by the price. It is an LG after all. Downfalls are a few I could find are the screen brightness is low and battery life is around 6 hours of heavy use. I bought it as unlocked phone to use overseas and it does even take 2 SIM cards.
customer_reviews.author: O.S.

customer_reviews.title: ... I received a defective model but this phone is garbage. If you are playing music it randomly stops ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I received a defective model but this phone is garbage. If you are playing music it randomly stops playing. Also apps freeze and malfunction my google service has also failed and its only been a week I have used this phone. In addition, the phone battery life is very short I am very disappointed in this phone the only positive is it takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No highlights at all
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this phone at all it drop calls all day every day from day one. When I am talking people hear me but I can not hear them.
customer_reviews.author: So SAD

customer_reviews.title: 16 gB of internal storage is 75% false
customer_reviews.text: Bought this yesterday. No apps loaded yet but the advertised 16 gB internal is 75% false. I hooked it up thru a USB to my laptop, there was only 4 gB left internal (75% of advertised). Not much room for personal apps, photos, and music. Pass this one by. In contrast, I had 7 gB left of my Samsung Avant w 16 gB internal with loads of personal apps on it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gajewski

customer_reviews.title: Good phone; doesn't work with T-Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Pros - I think there's a lot to like about this phone. For a low-budget device it's pretty snappy (haven't tried many games though) and has a decent set of features. I also really love the feel of it in your hand - for some reason it feels more "solid" than other models with similar price. Cons - Being an international model it only runs on lower bandwidths that I am told are being phased out in the US. Long story short, it doesn't work with T-mobile. I have the same screen timeout issue that others have reported where it times out way too fast arbitrarily. No SD card slot which was a bit disappointing as well.
customer_reviews.author: LoganandAmanda

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY IT'S A TRICK TOTAL GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: This phone only works for a month then stop it should not be sold to anyone else I read all the reviews I guess some of the phones you sell are good and some are not what's the sense in selling if you can't please all your customers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LG K10 K430 16GB Black, 5.3", 13MP, Unlocked - Black
product_meta.description: See and be seen. LG K10 Smartphone comes with a new fantastic look which is crafted with a sleek, modern pebble design that is visible even in bright sunlight. Your new look is crafted to perfection with a sleek, modern pebble design and a glossy display that’s vivid—even in bright sunlight. Life’s an adventure—don’t miss a moment of the action. Focus in and capture it by simply touching the screen. It has 8MP Rear Camera plus Touch and Shoot feature. Boost your imagination with smooth, steady performance and a battery that lasts as long as you, power through your day without pause.
feature_bullets: 16 GB de almacenamiento Soporte Micro SD de 32 GB.
LCD 5.3" HD IN-CELL Octa Core 1.3 ghz, Android 6.0 Marshmallow, 16GB Storage, 13 Mp Camera Flash + 8Mp Front Camera, Chipset: MT6753, Resolution: HD (720 x 1280).
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.

Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in some regions: GSM: 850/900/1800/1900, UMTS: 850/900/1900/2100, LTE: 1700/2100/2600/1900/700.
No compatible con Verizon, Sprint Nextel, Boost, Virgen, etc. o todos los no GSM Carriers
LCD 5.3" HD dispara Octa Core 1.3 GHz, Android 6.0 Marshmallow
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
The box contains: Your new device, USB cable, Charger, Earphones, Documentation.
Flash de cámara 13 MP + cámara frontal de 8 MP
